messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Going no mail... me too!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/11/03 12:35:24 PM Central Standard Time, shyrley@earthlink.net writes: See you all from the other side Shyrley ################# Shyrley,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/11/03 12:35:24 PM Central Standard Time,
shyrley@... writes:
See you all from the other side

Shyrley
#################

Shyrley, I will miss you very much and hope you have a safe and uneventful
trip back across the pond. I look forward to seeing you back here in December.
Take care and come back to us soon!

On the same topic, I will be going no mail tomorrow evening also. I will be
having surgery on Friday morning and will be in the hospital about four days
and recouping at home after, with no idea when I will be back on. Soon,
hopefully!

Good Luck and safe travels Shyrley and family!
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
